articles.author: Charlie Cooper
articles.title: Call for probe into Truss phone hack claims - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Labour calls for urgent investigation after report of hacking while Truss was foreign secretary.
articles.content: Claims that former U.K. Prime Minister Liz Truss mobile phone was hacked by foreign agents while she was serving as foreign secretary must be urgently investigated, the opposition Labour Party said.… [+1823 chars]

articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: European Union bans sale of petrol and diesel cars from 2035 to boost electric vehicle uptake - ABC News
articles.description: The European Union strikes a deal to effectively ban the sale of new petrol and diesel cars from 2035, aiming to speed up the switch to electric vehicles and combat climate change.
articles.content:
The European Union has struck a deal on a law to effectively ban the sale of new petrol and diesel cars from 2035, aiming to speed up the switch to electric vehicles and combat climate change.
